chargeHist.descr: Take and Drive Vehicle w/o Consent

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Attorney Knaak relates.

22CF79 Defendant Ethan S Colman in court.  Attorney Laura Ann Sutton in court for Ethan S Colman.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.
Attorney Sutton agrees.

Next hearing to be in person before Judge Babler.
Plea hearing scheduled for November 18, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:30 AM Defendant Ethan S Colman in court.  Attorney Laura Ann Sutton in court for Ethan S Colman.  Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court Reporter appears by zoom.

10:30  Court relates and gives appearances.
Defense acknowledges receipt of information and waives further reading of the same.
NG plea entered.
Atty. Sutton asks that plea hearing be set.
Plea hearing set; must appear in person.
Bond to continue.
Plea hearing scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 10:00 am.

1:11 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ethan S Colman appeared by video.  Attorney Laura Ann Sutton appeared by video for Ethan S Colman. 
1:12 Sgt. Andrew Schofield, Barron Police Department, called, sworn and direct by State.
1:17 Cross by Attorney Sutton.
1:18 Testimony closed.
Court finds probable cause and binds defendant over.
Defendant must appear in person for Arraignment.
Arraignment scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Attorney fees.  Laura Sutton appointed.  Repay $100.00 per month starting 07/01/2022.
Preliminary hearing on June 28, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Preliminary hearing on June 13, 2022 at 03:45 pm.
$100.00/month for repayment to Attorney Laura Sutton to begin 7/1/22.
